remarks: A standard textbook definition of a topological space.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2006.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
istps4OLD $p |- ( <. A , J >. e. TopSpOLD <-> ( ( J C_ ~P A /\ (/) e. J /\ A e. J ) /\ ( A. x ( x C_ J -> U. x e. J ) /\ A. x ( ( x C_ J /\ x =/= (/) /\ x e. Fin ) -> |^| x e. J ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d J x $.
